column1: Local Foods////The sandwiches here are good
column2: but they are nothing special beyond the merit of the ingredients individually. Of the ones I've tried
column3: the salmon bagel is definitely my favorite. The pretzel buns there are also really yummy. However
column4: I sometimes feel as though the food's main merit is the quality of the individual ingredients and not how they are put together
column5: so most of my meals here have been mediocre. Moreover
column6: I have never left Local Foods full despite the hefty price of their sandwiches (~$10-13) - the portions are pretty small. That said
column7: I really admire what this restaurant is doing with respect to its ingredients and food sustainability
column8: and I think other restaurants should follow suit if they haven't done so already!
